definition: adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: After walking away from the six-party talks, North Korea tested its second nuclear device.
sentences.chinese: 北韓退出六方會談後，發射了第二枚核裝置。

sentences.english: In May 2009, North Korea detonated a nuclear device.
